text:
Justices Amendment (Notice to Attend) Rules 2007

The Magistrates Rule Committee, in the exercise of its powers under section 15AE of the Magistrates Court Act 1987 , makes the following rules of court for courts of summary jurisdiction exercising jurisdiction under the Justices Act 1959 .

1. Short title
    These rules may be cited as the Justices Amendment (Notice to Attend) Rules 2007 .

2. Commencement
    These rules of court take effect on the day on which their making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Rules
    In these rules, the Justices Rules 2003 are referred to as the Principal Rules.

4.
    The amendment effected by this rule has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Justices Rules 2003 .

These rules of court were made by the Magistrates Rule Committee at a meeting held on 13 December 2007.

A. G. SHOTT

Chief Magistrate

M. R. HILL

Deputy Chief Magistrate

D. J. JONES

Member

S. F. MOLLARD

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 December 2007

These rules are administered in the Department of Justice.
